item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-08-28
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Have watched 5 minutes of "The Happening", it really is a horrible as expected. #
  • Went to weather.com. Flash ad covers all the content on the page, can't skip it for X amount of seconds. Weather.com that's not cool. #
  • RT: Lovely film of 100 years of special FX: (via @donttrythis) #
  • RT: Awwww..... Reading Rainbow ends today after 26 years. This was a favorite of my childhood. (via @fictfact) #
  • I'm at The Mall at Chestnut Hill (199 Boylston Street, Chestnut Hill). #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
